attributes.action: ensure Edexcel provide justice to GCSE History students who took their modular exams in January 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Numerous teachers have voiced their concern with the quality of this exam board's assessment, but to no avail. Edexcel need take the concerns of teaching staff & their students seriously & investigate the poor results given to hardworking & well prepared students.
